name: Magical Lands
description:
This is a top-down real-time strategy game where you control soldiers to protect an ancient obelisk from the forces of evil.
Call on soldiers for protection. Try to manage your resources correctly!
Some soldiers attack in close combat, some shoot from afar, some attack in an area.
Also, don't forget to use the obelisk's abilities! Summon ice blocks that will fly at your enemies, place barrels that will explode if an enemy approaches them, use slowdown to stop the enemy...
Use tactics and fight off the hordes of evil and you will win!

-Dynamic gameplay
-Dangerous enemies
-Interesting gameplay
